title: Installation issue: less
body:
I am building a container with spack installed there, this is the Dockerfile

```
# Build stage with Spack pre-installed and ready to be used
FROM spack/ubuntu-bionic:0.16.0 as builder

# Copy the spack.yaml file with the specs into the container
COPY spack.yaml /opt/spack-environment/spack.yaml

# Install the software, remove unnecessary deps
RUN cd /opt/spack-environment && spack env activate . && spack install -v --fail-fast && spack gc -y

# Strip all the binaries
RUN find -L /opt/view/* -type f -exec readlink -f '{}' \; | \
    xargs file -i | \
    grep 'charset=binary' | \
    grep 'x-executable\|x-archive\|x-sharedlib' | \
    awk -F: '{print $1}' | xargs strip -s

# Modifications to the environment that are necessary to run
RUN cd /opt/spack-environment && \
    spack env activate --sh -d . >> /etc/profile.d/z10_spack_environment.sh


# Bare OS image to run the installed executables
FROM ubuntu:18.04

COPY --from=builder /opt/spack-environment /opt/spack-environment
COPY --from=builder /opt/software /opt/software
COPY --from=builder /opt/view /opt/view
COPY --from=builder /etc/profile.d/z10_spack_environment.sh /etc/profile.d/z10_spack_environment.sh



ENTRYPOINT ["/bin/bash", "--rcfile", "/etc/profile", "-l"]

```

When trying to install "less" from the copied ```spack.yaml``` file it does not work.

This is the minimum ```spack.yaml``` file to reproduce the problem
```
spack:
  concretization: separately

  config:
    install_tree: /opt/software

  packages:
    all:
      target: [x86_64]

  specs:
  - less@551

  view: /opt/view
```

### Information on your system
* **Spack:** 0.16.0-199-5b1739da7
* **Python:** 3.7.3
* **Platform:** linux-ubuntu18.04-skylake
* **Concretizer:** original

This is how I try to build the container image
```
docker build --no-cache --cpuset-cpus 0-3 -t base:0.16.0 .
```

### General information
- [x] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [ ] I have run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and @mentioned any maintainers
- [ ] I have uploaded the build log and environment files  --- do not know how to to this since it stops at the creation of the container image
- [x] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
